item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#0937; 03:31PM; 4358 Griffith Park Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3k8IMAa; Griffith Park; Firefighters located a 76yo M (reported to have fallen off a bicycle) in grave condition. Griffith Park Rangers were on scene, prior to LAFD, providing immediate medical care. The patient is being transferred to LAFD Firefighter/Paramedics who are providing advanced life-saving care and bringing him to the awaiting LAFD Air Ambulance for rapid transport. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:08PM ; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA76 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0601; 11:44AM; 1466 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xP6I3B; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to one room in the home. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E248 E36 E49 E64 RA36 RA38 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0601; 11:28AM; 1466 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xP6I3B; Wilmington; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E248 E36 E49 E64 RA36 RA38 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:55PM; 15017 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kcbg6q; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 56 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. The structure is a one story, vacant restaurant . The bulk of the fire was towards the rear (unknown name of occupancy). The exposed buildings to the north (Charlie side) and East (Bravo) of the building were defended from any extension. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC9 CM42 E239 E260 E273 E293 E39 E83 E88 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 RA39 RA78 RA83 RA99 T39 T60 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:32PM; 15000 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K7qQBB; Sherman Oaks; One row of small commercial units with fire showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E239 E293 E39 E83 E99 RA83 RA99 T39 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#1443; 08:22PM; 6800 N Valley Circle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MoHfBV; West Hills; LAFD Air Operations located the injured hiker, approximately 25yo M with significant traumatic injuries sustained in an approx 100' fall. A hoist operation is underway and the patient will be transported in critical condition. Ventura County Fire Department is also on scene with a full hiker response. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:55PM. No further details.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E288 E305 E73 E88 H0E H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA106 RA88 RH114 T105 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1018; 03:33PM; 8200 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kmoUcZ; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 43 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the building of origin, prevented from extending to the attached businesses. The cause of the fire is TBD. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 CM42 E24 E260 E298 E77 E89 E98 RA77 RA889 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#1005; 03:06PM; 3711 E Baldwin St; MAP: https://bit.ly/36D1e0s; Lincoln Heights; A vehicle rolled down a small embankment and is 'wedged' between apartment buildings. There are no injuries and no one is entrapped. LAFD Heavy Rescue will likely use the hook to remove the vehicle. There does not appear to be any structural damage to the building (superficial damage to a patio). No further updates anticipated.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E16 E201 E203 E227 EM13 HR3 RA2 RA827 RA85 T1 T27 T3 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1018; 03:13PM; 8200 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kmoUcZ; Sun Valley; One story, vacant with previous burns, commercial building with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 E24 E260 E298 E77 E89 E98 RA77 RA889 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1550; 09:39PM; 300 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L4WYG7; Historic South-Central; Firefighters responded to a three story, center hall apartment building with nothing showing upon arrival. Fire attack made entry and located smoke from one unit. Inside the unit they found 'food on the stove'. There was no fire, only the smoke from the burnt food. Upon searching the unit, they located an adult patient down on the bathroom floor. Firefighter/Paramedics immediately initiated advanced life saving medical aid. Sadly, the patient was determined dead on scene and not considered to be related to the smoke in the unit. (age/gender unknown at this time). The incident will be turned over to LAPD and LA County Coroner for the death investigation. The 9-1-1 call was received at 9:13PM. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E14 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
